#summary Script language in Zildo

= Commands =

|| *command* || *type* || *who* || *what* || *unblock* || *meaning* ||
|| pos || position || V || V || V || Set character or camera's location ||
|| moveTo || position || V || V || V || Move character or camera's location, progressively. ||
|| speak || text || V || V || V || Launch a dialog ||
|| script || int || V || V || V || Set character's script ||
|| angle || int || V || V || V || Set character's angle ||
|| wait || int || V || V || V || Wait for a given number of frame ||
|| sound || text || V || V || V || Play a given sound ||
|| fadeIn || int || V || V || V || Start a fade in, with given effect ||
|| fadeOut || int || V || V || V || Start a fade out, with given effect ||
|| map || text || - || - || - || Load the given map ||
|| focus || text || V || - || - || Focus on given character ||
